code: import React from"react";import Authorization from"./Authorization";import Chat from"./Chat";import{useUserStore}from"../stores/users";var Main=function Main(){var activeUserId=useUserStore(function(state){return state.activeUserId;});var users=useUserStore(function(state){return state.users;});var isValidActiveId=React.useMemo(function(){return users.some(function(user){return user.id===activeUserId;});},[users,activeUserId]);if(activeUserId==null||!isValidActiveId){return React.createElement(Authorization,null);}return React.createElement(Chat,null);};export default Main;
